actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for civil suits against the United States on tort claims arising out of the loss, miscarriage, or negligent transmission of letters or postal matter.

summary.text: Provides for civil suits against the United States on tort claims arising out of the loss, miscarriage, or negligent transmission of letters or postal matter. (Repeals 28 U.S.C. 2680(b))

titles.title: A bill to provide for civil suits against the United States on tort claims arising out of the loss, miscarriage, or negligent transmission of letters or postal matter.
